short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will provide some of the advanced search tools provided by MyAuthorSuite.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Amazon self-publishing business with M.A.S. Search Tool, the free and essential tool for independent authors.

This extension packs powerful market analysis features provided by MyAuthorSuite, optimized for major Amazon marketplaces (USA, Italy, UK, France, Spain, and Germany).

Key Features:

• Discover the best keywords with our advanced dual-mode Keyword Research and exclusive popularity indicator 
• Quick and intuitive niche market analysis 
• Keyword highlighting on search pages for instant visibility 
• Analysis of recent publications in niches
• Detailed product page analysis 
• Accurate profit calculation for each paperback copy sold 
...and much more!

M.A.S. Search Tool is designed to be lightweight, fast, and easy to use, ensuring a smooth and non-invasive experience while browsing. 
Your data security is our priority: the extension operates locally without sharing information with external servers.

Optimize your Amazon KDP self-publishing journey with this essential tool, providing you with valuable market insights quickly and effectively.

For more information and other extraordinary advanced tools dedicated to self-publishers, visit: https://myauthorsuite.com/
For questions and support, contact us via email: info@myauthorsuite.com


Disclaimer: M.A.S. Search Tool and its creators are not affiliated or associated with Amazon in any way.
